name: Nice Fall (Nice Gear Games)
description:
Race to the bottom of the well! Jump, fall, and smush your opponent and try to beat them to the goal. Watch out for bats and spikes! 1PvCOM and 1Pv2P modes available. WASD for 1P, arrow keys for 2P!

Created for Ludum Dare 48 Jam (Deeper and Deeper) and updated for #Unity1Week 「2」 with additional features and bug fixes. Click here to play the original Ludum Dare version.

井戸の底に先についたほうが勝ち。
基本的にはただ落ちるだけ！！
2人対戦バトル、CPU対戦モードがあります。
